trans-unit.source: Face Recognition in Challenging Environments: An Experimental and Reproducible Research Survey
trans-unit.target: 挑战环境下的人脸识别。实验性和可重复性研究调查。

trans-unit.source: For installation and usage instructions, please read the online documentation.
trans-unit.target: 有关安装和使用说明，请阅读在线文档。

trans-unit.source: In case anything goes wrong, please contact our mailing list.
trans-unit.target: 如果出现任何问题，请联系我们的邮件列表。

trans-unit.source: Running the experiments as described in the boock chapter "Face Recognition in Challenging Environments: An Experimental and Reproducible Research Survey"
trans-unit.target: 按照boock章节 "Challenging Environments中的人脸识别。实验和可重复性研究调查"

trans-unit.source: This package provides all the scripts to run the face verification experiments of the book chapter “Face Recognition in Challenging Environments: An Experimental and Reproducible Research Survey”, which is part of the Springer book “Face Recognition Across the Imaging Spectrum”. The original publication can be downloaded from the Idiap publication server and from the Springer web page.
trans-unit.target: 该软件包提供了运行脚本一章“具有挑战性的环境中的人脸识别：实验性和可再现性研究调查”一书中的所有脚本，该书属于施普林格著作“整个成像光谱中的人脸识别”。可以从Idiap发布服务器和Springer网页下载原始出版物。
